alert.note: Alert for Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 10:44PM CDT until September 08 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR WESTERN TARRANT COUNTY... At 1043 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sansom Park, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Haltom City, Keller, Southlake, Watauga, Benbrook, Saginaw, White Settlement, Azle, Trophy Club, River Oaks, Sansom Park, Lake Worth, Eagle Mountain, Briar, North Richland Hills, Roanoke, Pecan Acres, Westworth Village, and Blue Mound. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
